fairly sure it's nothing to do with your code. I'm forwarding this back to
the list in the hopes that someone else can help you.

    Wait, if the class is TestHelloClass and it's in the samples package,
why are you saying junit.samples.TestHelloClass? Try it again like this:
 
    java junit.awtui.TestRunner  samples.TestHelloClass

prompt you must type "java samples\TestClass"
